rules_text:
Whenever one or more cards you own are put into exile from anywhere, create a Food token.
{2}, Sacrifice a Food: Surveil 3. [i](Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Fermented Feast: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Fermented Feast, you may exile it. If you do, exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a Food artifact with “{2}, {T}: Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life,” and it loses all other card types.
notes:
Changed names, added art, added flavor text
Front: 5MV 4/4 —> 3MV 3/3
Reworked front
+Legendary backside
Reworked back
